review_blob: The name of the beer is Cerveza Potpo.  I recently found it in Rosarita, Mexico, just south of Tijuana.  It is a dark beer with good creamy body and full flavor, coffee and chocolate.  Dont know if it is seasonal.  It is 4.7% alcohol by volume.  It comes is a blue ligueur shaped bottle, long slender neck with fat round bottom.  The best Mexican beer I have tasted.
